metadata.dc:author: Fonseca da Cruz, I C
metadata.dc:description: This paper deals with nursing diagnoses which can be made in patients with essential high blood pressure. Diagnoses about lack of knowledge, anxiety, self-esteem disturbance, excessive circulating flow and nourishment excess, are dealt with from a nursing point of view.
metadata.dc:title: Posibles diagnósticos de enfermería para clientes con hipertensión arterial esencial.
[Possible nursing diagnoses for clients with essential arterial hypertension].
